activities: Personal Information Received from the EU/EEA and/or Switzerland. Personal data gathered digitally or manually is secured and protected by use of best practices and policies for data security. Employees have been trained on the gathering, security and distribution of personal data per the use of these policies.
privacyprograms: Helix Systems will provide standard forms that allow the individual recourse in the event of disputes or disagreement and will dutifully work to honor the request of each individual regarding their data. Unresolved complaints will be referred to a private sector dispute resolution mechanism that will adhere to the safe harbor framework and/or EU data protection authorities.
recoursemech: Helix Systems client agreement calls for aribtration through the American Arbitration Association (AAA).
